name: Fighterz feat. Morbius
description: Menu Controls: Click buttons with the mouse, press '+' to add fighters and '-' to remove the last fighter Battle Controls: WASD to move, ',' for melee attack, '.' for projectile attack ---------------------------------- There is exactly one Player and they are always the first fighter (red) You can have as many fighters as you like, but you do have to drag a token to a character for each one The game ends when there is just one fighter left -- you'll see a unique visual effect be applied
